extended_tweet.full_text: A ‘Saturimetro’ (oximeter) is a tool to measure the amount of oxygen in the blood. Using it can help to promptly identify any dyspnea, one of the symptoms of the most severe form of #covid19. Values ​​above 96% are considered normal. find the oximeter in the pharmacy or via apps https://t.co/iBhYBcHG4x
